title: Review VFX Shot for Approval
description: A VFX artist has submitted a new version of a complex visual effects shot for the director's approval.

tasks.description: Retrieve the latest version of the VFX shot and the director's notes from the previous version.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accesses the new video file and the director's feedback.

tasks.description: Place the shot in the director's daily review playlist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds the shot to the secure online review platform for the director.

tasks.description: After the review, update the shot's status to 'Approved' based on the director's feedback.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the approval and updates the shot's status in the tracking system.
